channel.title: CVE Feed for vaultdweller -- Leyka
channel.description: The latest CVEs for vaultdweller -- Leyka

item.title: CVE-2023-4917|2024-08-02T07:44:52.230Z -- vaultdweller -- leyka
item.description: The Leyka plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in versions up to, and including, 3.30.3 via the 'leyka_ajax_get_env_and_options' function. This can allow authenticated attackers with subscriber-level permissions or above to extract sensitive data including Sberbank API key and password, PayPal Client Secret, and more keys and passwords.
